text: On 9 April 1940, the German army launched a invasion of Denmark and Norway. In under 6 hours, the Danish surrendered and the Germans launched the invasion of Norway. On the same day, 9 April, by 10 June, the governments would surrender to the Germans ending the Nazi invasion of Denmark and Norway. ==References== Category:1940 events Category:1940 in Europe Category:1940s in Norway Category:1940s in Denmark Category:European battles of World War II
